content: @Davera Gabriel Are recordings from the workgroup meetings available anywhere? I couldn't find a link to a video repo on Confluence.

Hello @Michael Kahn They should be posted to the minutes for the meetings that they apply to. I thought I was recording some of thsoe meetings and did not after all. When I have recorded successfully, I have access to a link and not the file itself. The meeting where Shahim presented the MEDNS examples is here and here Let me know if either of you have any trouble accessing these
Best
Davera
